headline: Brazen Shooting Near Courthouse May Have Been Revenge
abstract: After assailants fired into a car in Bridgeport, Conn., wounding four people, the police chief tied the attack to a killing the night before.
lead_paragraph: There are sensors spread across downtown Bridgeport, Conn., that can pinpoint the location of gunfire and alert the police. On Sunday night, they detected telltale crackles at an apartment building in the area.
